about.title: Building trust in giving
about.subtitle: ImpactGive connects donors with verified causes to make giving transparent, fast, and meaningful.
about.missionBody: Empower donors and nonprofits with tools that maximize impact.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Transparent giving from start to finish. Discover causes, donate securely, and track impact in real time.
howItWorks.step1Body: Explore verified campaigns curated for transparency and impact.
howItWorks.step2Body: Support causes securely with quick, encrypted checkout.
howItWorks.step3Body: Receive updates and outcomes from organizers.

forNonprofits.title: Grow Your Impact
forNonprofits.subtitle: Launch campaigns, engage donors, and share progress with a trusted community of supporters.
forNonprofits.card1Body: We verify organizations to build donor confidence and reduce fraud.
forNonprofits.card2Body: Create compelling campaigns with flexible goals, media, and updates.
forNonprofits.card3Body: Track performance and communicate outcomes to supporters.

safetyTrust.title: Your security is our priority
safetyTrust.subtitle: We use verification, secure payments, and continuous monitoring to protect donors and beneficiaries.
safetyTrust.card1Body: We verify nonprofits and fundraisers before they go live.
safetyTrust.card2Body: All transactions are encrypted and processed by trusted partners.
safetyTrust.card3Body: We monitor for suspicious activity and respond quickly.
safetyTrust.card4Body: Campaign updates keep donors informed and confident.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body: We respect your privacy and explain how data is collected and used.

terms.title: Terms & Service
terms.body: These terms govern your use of ImpactGive services and features.

eula.title: EULA
eula.body: This End User License Agreement outlines the terms for using the ImpactGive platform.

protection.title: How we protect your donations
protection.subtitle: We keep donations safe with secure access, verified organizers, and clear tracking so you always know where your support goes.
protection.card1Body: Accounts use secure sessions and protected routes so only authorized users can access sensitive data.
protection.card2Body: Organizer verification helps reduce fraud and builds donor trust before campaigns go live.
protection.card3Body: Donations are tracked with receipts and timelines so you can review your impact anytime.
protection.card4Body: We review reports and monitor activity so suspicious behavior can be handled quickly.
